title: Donnafugata chases top Golf and MICE honours at prestigious global awards
text:
Donnafugata chases top Golf and MICE honours at prestigious global awards Donnafugata chases top Golf and MICE honours at prestigious global awards Details Category: Hotel   15:15 Sicily’s five-star Donnafugata Golf Resort & SPA will go head-to-head with the cream of the world’s luxury destination resorts for golf and business after receiving a double nomination for the 2015 Prestigious Star Awards, which will be held in London later this year. The deluxe venue in Ragusa, south-east Italy, is one of only three resorts to have been shortlisted in both the ‘Most Prestigious Corporate Incentive Venue’ and ‘Most Prestigious Sporting Venue’ categories. 
Organised by Prestigious Venues, the Prestigious Star Awards celebrate the quality, performance and reputation of the world’s best and most distinguished venues qualified to host the most memorable events. Public voting is open until the end of July, with the 20 award winners set to be announced at a lavish prize-giving ceremony on September 18. Announcing the nominations, Prestigious Venues said: “The luxury five-star Donnafugata Golf Resort & SPA promises an unforgettable experience in one of the most enchanting parts of Sicily. For both private and corporate events, the resort’s state-of-the-art design, sophisticated décor and prestigious style make the perfect venue for an array of events that are authentic, innovative and luxurious.” Prestigious Venues brings together a selection of the world’s leading event venues in one portfolio, and Donnafugata Resort became the first golfing venue in Italy to be invited to join the exclusive group earlier in the year. Easily accessible from Catania and Comiso international airport – just 15 minutes away – the Resort is one of Italy’s must-visit destinations and offers both business groups and golfers the perfect base to enjoy a five-star break in an idyllic climate – and the chance to experience some of the many delights of the Mediterranean’s largest island. The Congress Center at Donnafugata Golf Resort & SPA boasts eight different meeting rooms, all fully equipped and with sophisticated decors. Featuring a variety of different areas, the centre can cater for a maximum 350 people making the Resort ideal for meetings, conventions, incentives and any type of corporate event. All meeting rooms are naturally-lit, elegantly furnished and equipped with the latest audio-visual and conference technologies. Room sizes vary from 28m² up to 315m², while the Resort’s array of indoor and outdoor spaces can easily be adapted for any event. Donnafugata Resort is also home to a luxury 900m2 Spa with indoor pool, hydro-massage, sauna, steam bath and gym areas, with a range of seasonally-selected treatments available, while the award-winning venue’s location offers the ideal opportunity to explore the unique gastronomic delights of the region. Host of the 2011 Sicilian Open and featuring two 18-hole championship courses, the Resort has won widespread praise from the golf industry since opening in 2010, and its new Darren Clarke Centre of Excellence – the only one of its kind on the continent featuring Europe’s new Ryder Cup captain – offers a variety of tuition packages and individual lessons for golfers of all abilities aged six and above. Donnafugata boasts a number of fantastic historical cities to explore nearby including Val di Noto, the heart of Sicilian baroque; Ragusa Ibla, Modica, Siracuse, Noto and Scicli. All are deemed fitting of UNESCO World Heritage status. As well as outstanding business and golf facilities, Donnafugata Golf Resort & SPA has two swimming pools, a private beach and three restaurants offering a broad selection of ‘0km food’ locally-sourced gastronomic delights, well accompanied by perfect Sicilian wines to enhance flavour.
